commit message:
website: add notes on using the {tamper,grease}monkey update process - easier than a reinstall
also remove the (long out-dated) notes on manual removal of the 'original - before iitc.jonatkins.com' release - I don't think anyone will have this installed any more
website: remove tampermonkey note about 'two dialogs' - the latest version now has just one
start gmaps directly in nav-mode. this way we get a labeled marker with locales using decimal comma separator too (thanks joerg wagner)
bumped version number on mobile
add licence and g+ links to about dialog
added method to get versionCode of mobile app to JSInterface
removed test code
Initial version, highlights portals which are running low on outbound links.
multiple authors in licence message
Removed extraneous comments.
don't try to draw location while iitc boots
tile data cache - reduce size on mobile (due to limited RAM), and increase on desktop
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/jonatkins/ingress-intel-total-conversion

Merge pull request #511 from ZasoGD/Bookmarks-2.1

Update Bookmarks: 2.1 version
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/jonatkins/ingress-intel-total-conversion
plugin for MapQuest Open Aerial Tiles (satellite view). not a default layer, as rather limited detail outside the mainland US
rename the 'default ingress map' to include 'Google' prefix, to make it clear it's a google map. should help troubleshooting relating to map layers, making it clear which are/aren't google ones
a few tweaks to wording in toe bookmarks plugin

ap-list plugin: fix missing isSameResonator function - was removed from IITC core
fix #529

on the portalAdded event, include a previousDetails parameter when we're changing an existing portals data
for #504
bump version, in preperation for next release
Work in progress: New plugin: Draw resonators
Work in progress: Plugin draw resonators: add resonators and connectors render function
Work in progress: Plugin Draw Resonators: bug fix
Plugin Draw Resonators: Zooming in will redraw all resonators if they was removed by zooming out.
Plugin Draw Resonators: add comment for Render and change an ambiguous function name
Plugin Draw Resonators: Only run the redraw logic on zooming in when the level of portal is shown on map.
Plugin AP List: use timestamp to check update of portal data.
Plugin AP List: Change entry hook to mapDataRefreshEnd
Plugin AP List: add comments

Merge pull request #528 from Xelio/plugin-draw-resonators

Plugin draw resonators

add a missing munge for ascendingTimestampOrder
(we don't currently use it so it was missed)

limit portals drawn to the map in dense areas, to avoid slowing down leaflet too much
unfortunately, this wasn't as much of a speed boost as i'd hoped. just downloading/processing the data for 20,000+ portals from the server, even if only 2000 are displayed, still takes a LONG time
for #526
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/jonatkins/ingress-intel-total-conversion
remove 'resonator-display-zoom-level-decrease' as it now does nothing
remove check for portal guid type. completely unnecessaty now - only portals will evewr be in this object

remove dead code
- guid to type - unused, and not a good way of doing the test
- resonator settings - it's now a separate plugin
Plugin AP List: add checking for changing in fields

Merge pull request #532 from Xelio/patch-plugin-ap-list-1

Update Plugin AP List
website: update faq on debug tile colours for 0.14.0
website: fix matching against date/time in version number string when formatting for neat display
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/jonatkins/ingress-intel-total-conversion

moved sync plugin in misc-category since it now works with the bookmarks
plugin too
make chat code remember and restore the last chat tab used on reload
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/jonatkins/ingress-intel-total-conversion
after map move, check to see if a refresh is actually required, or if the previous timeout can be restored
update leaflet library from 0.6.3 to 0.6.4

allow the in-ram cache to be optional, and disable it for now
the new tile retry code makes this cache much less useful now, so it ends up sucking up ram more than being useful

remove debug console.log
add comments about possible future improvements

re-tune the cache code so it's much more short-term storage
the original reason for longer term storage were the frequent error==TIMEOUT from map tiles. since these are now retried, as the stock site does, the remaining use for the cache is more short term, while panning around an area

more improvements to the data requesting
- fix idle resume, so it only occurs if the existing timer has been cancelled
- re-instate the cache, and updates for interface changes
- add a short delay between the initialisation of map data retreival, and actually starting network requests
Refactor code of select/unselect portal. Add hook 'portalSelected' with guid of selected and unselected portal.
Plugin bookmark for maps and portals: Change to use hook 'portalSelected' to remove star instead of modify window.unselectOldPortal().
Fix comment.

Merge pull request #537 from Xelio/hook-select-portal

Refactor code of select/unselect portal. Add hook 'portalSeleted'.

Updated autolink.js and taphold.js to the latest from their upstream repos.
The changes are mainly bugfixes and a few performance improvements.
Note that autolink.js is now the minified version from upstream.

Merge pull request #538 from gabrielsjoberg/external_updates

Update autolink.js and taphold.js from upstream.
add current taphold.js - the one merged from #538 was broken

trap exceptions when running hooks, log the error, and continue
should reduce issues caused when plugins are broken
pushed android max target to 4.3
Used TEAM_RES and TEAM_ENL constants, rather than magic numbers.
call WebView method in UI thread (thx for the hint fkloft)
do never use cache when google account page is loaded
Plugin Draw Resonator: Change resonators style on portal selection

Merge pull request #539 from Xelio/patch-plugin-draw-reso-1

Plugin Draw Resonator: Change resonators style on portal selection

better selected portal handling
- ensure the selected portal isn't deleted when it isn't in the map data (e.g. due to zoom level)
- always show the selected portal on the map, even if the high density clustering code would have removed it
- deselect the selected portal, and clear the details bar, in the rare instance of the portal being deleted server-side (i.e. in the deletedEntities list)
update lat/lng clamping, to take account of the map projection not going beyond 85 degrees north/south

slight improvement around the antimeridian - wrap the map centre so it's always between +-180 degrees
also limit north/south to 85 degrees, to avoid leaving the active map area
fix bookmarks plugin when userscript is before IITC main script
refresh tweaks, reduced logging
portal highlighter: shield+link mitugation

more tweaks to the request code
- delay briefly before retrying a timeout, and a bit longer before other errors
- also delay briefly before running the queue after a request, to give a chance of more than one request's requeued entries being handled atr once
- add a min tiles per request, to avoid sending multiple requests when only a few queued items remain
these are attempts to be nicer to the niantic servers, particularly in error cases, with some based on my best guess of the stock site behaviour, and others based on what seems reasonable to me
update description to include details of the highlighter
update draw-resonators to remove dependancy on portalsLayers

make (portals/lihnks/fields)Layers private to IITC core again - they're not for plugins
now only some portals are drawn to the map it's OK to bring them all to front at the end of the render
use larger squares for portal clustering on mobile - as the portal markers are larger

include specific font subsets from googleapi fonts - as the defaults seem to vary by browser type (less for mobile)
switch defailt from coda to roboto - looks fine to me, and coda didn't seem to support enough subsets
for #541

Merge pull request #530 from cathesaurus/upstream

New Highlighter: Outbound Link Counter

Merge pull request #480 from fkloft/signout

Always show 'sign out' link in IITCm.
use header for plugins pref
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:jonatkins/ingress-intel-total-conversion
removed not used namespace

made the plugin prefs container static. finished plugin headers. this has multiple advantages:
1) it is enough to parse the plugins only on first start of this
activity (not on every start of the preferences or this activity)
2) actionbar control (not possible with nested preferences)
3) it looks more fancy on tablets
change targetPackage for pluginPreference intent for test-builds (fixes #544)
remove broken debug code - this didn't do anything useful after the render rewrite

first stage of having faction-specific layers - portals, links and fields are now a layer group consisting of three faction-specific leaflet LayerGroups
also, move load.js from directly embedded in boot.js into an external file

add faction layer choosers
fix #536
faction layers - add/remove fields and links before portals - this way portals tend to remain above links/fields when things are toggled

add selected portal marker colour *after* running the portal highlighter
for #547
user plugins back to top + use header categories
let farm_level_select work on mobile (fix for #548)
calculate number of plugins correctly
force leaflet popup msg color to black on mobile (fix for #548)
align farm-finder-select to the right on mobile (fix for #548)
updated changelog and bumped version number of farm finder
Plugin Draw Resonators: Add callback and call them in Optinos.changeOption
Plugin Draw Resonators: Create callback function in render
Plugin Draw Resonators: Add dialog for changing the zoom level which resonators start to display.
Plugin Draw Resonators: Add styler: highlight my resonators
Plugin Draw Resonators: Add styler option to setting dialog, fix a few bugs in setting dialog
Plugin Draw Resonators: Add styler: Highlight L8 resonators

Merge pull request #542 from Xelio/patch-plugin-draw-reso-2

Plugin Draw Resonator: Add dialog for changing the zoom level which resonators start to display
max links: start rename process to 'tidy links'

update munge sets for new one seen in the wild
also attempt to munge method names. this has not been tested though, as only my cron job has seen the new munge sets, not the browser
for #552

Fix color resetting in plugins

Remove defaulting in highlighters, which isn't needed, and was setting
the wrong thing anyway.  Also a little new hightlighter

also use munged RPC name in URL - as that's what the stock javescript does (as far as I can tell - it's stopped returning this munged version for now)
for #552

Merge pull request #553 from vita10gy/highlighter_fix

Fix color resetting in plugins

* added advanced menu...most users are not interested in the debug pane
* moved debug pane to advanced menu
* added clear-cookie button to advanced menu (fix for #551)
bumped version number, removed not used dimens entry
Status persistence of Layer Chooser: Change to save status on 'overlayadd' and 'overlayremove' events. Instead of checking .overlay everytime a layer is added or removed.
Plugin Draw Resonators: Add styler: Highlight resonators with less than 10% energy

Merge pull request #555 from Xelio/patch-event-overlay-add-remove

Status persistence of Layer Chooser: Change to save status on 'overlayadd' and 'overlayremove' events. Instead of checking .overlay everytime a layer is added or removed.

revert plugin name change - it breaks automatic updates
(from #553)
bump version number. it seemed to have been increased and reverted at some point (possibly just dev/test/local builds?) breaking auto updates
use 'overlayadd/remove' instead of 'layeradd/remove' events. in theory should be more efficient as layeradd/remove gets called for every single portal/link/field/etc on the map

create missing link data from portal link info - so short links not sent are shown in the map

note: need to add code to hide short links from the map - and update the shown/hidden links after a zoom
(similar to the portal cluster showing/hiding portals after a zoom)

only add link entities to the layer if they're long enough to be visible
an improvement on 4838de6788ad27bbf6357e1ac9099744483a9e01 to prevent excessive links being drawn when lots of portals are loaded
fix idle resume sometimes triggering during an existing request
add comment as a reminder of possible future work to clear 'faked' links earlier - if possible
back to lat,lng query since gmaps v7.2 fixes the decimal separator bug
Plugin Draw Resonators: Change description to reflect the styler function.

add function to start 'idle' mode - for use in the mobile app (rather than it forcing the idle timer)
the existing idle resume function can be used on returning to iitc

also, fix the long-standing bug on mobile where the map disappears after repeated touch panning/zooming. seems leaflet gets confused about zoom levels and ends up with a non-ingeger. when this is found, force it back to an ingeger zoom level when this happens
add a function to query if a player guid is for a system special account (e.g. __ADA__ or __JARVIS__, possibly others in future too - NIAOPS?)

hide system accounts (__ADA__, __JARVIS__, etc) from the player list in guess player levels
for #559 (and possibly another older bug?)

move player name cache from localStorage to sessionStorage
this gives a simple method of expiring entries. also, prevents localStorage from filling up with thousands of player names over time
(ideally something controllable with configurable age should be used, but this was a quick and simple change to try first)
more tweaks, and some logging, to the enter/exit of idle mode
new plugin, for use on unattended display screens. causes idle mode to be left once per hour, refreshing chat and map data

Plugin Draw Resonator: Add styler to highlight player's resonators or L8 resonators
add linkAdded and fieldAdded hooks, to mirror the portalAdded hook

experimental plugin to show link direction. slowly animating dashes are shown at the source portal for links
performance is an issue when many links are displayed...
Plugin Draw Resonators: Allow add/remove option to setting dialog dynamically.
Plugin Draw Resonators: Styler: Change 'Hightlight <10% resonators' styler to allow user input percentage
Plugin Draw Resonators: New Styler: Highlight resonators deployed by specific player

add link direction info to tooltop on portal
some tweaks/fixes to the formatting
mobile: add extra padding and a button-like border around sidebar links. makes them much easier to click
more mobile css tweaks to make sidebar items easier to click on
removed redundant line of code

pause link animations while the map is being dragged - improves user experience when the map is densely populated

Code formatting
